org.jhove2.module.aggrefy
Class GlobPathRecognizer

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.reportable.AbstractReportable
      org.jhove2.module.AbstractModule
          org.jhove2.module.aggrefy.AbstractRecognizer
              org.jhove2.module.aggrefy.GlobPathRecognizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Reportable, Recognizer, Module
@Persistent
public class GlobPathRecognizer
extends AbstractRecognizer

Aggregate identifier that uses filepath globbing to detect instances of Clump Formats Each instance of a GlobPathRecognizer can recognize instances of a single format

Author:
smorrissey

Minimum number of files that must match the mustHaveExpr in order for a set of Sources to be considered an instance of an aggregate Format. Allows us to identify potentially defective instances of a format

GlobPathRecognizer

public GlobPathRecognizer()
Instantiate a new GlobPathRecognizer.

GlobPathRecognizer

public GlobPathRecognizer(ModuleAccessor moduleAccessor)
Instantiate a new GlobPathRecognizer.

Parameters:
ModuleAccessor - to manage persistence

GlobPathRecognizer

public GlobPathRecognizer(ModuleAccessor moduleAccessor,
                          I8R format,
                          String fileGroupingExpr,
                          String mustHaveExpr,
                          String mayHaveExpr,
                          int fileGroupingCaptureGroupIndex,
                          int mustHaveCaptureGroupIndex,
                          int mayHaveCaptureGroupIndex,
                          int minMustHavesToIdentify,
                          boolean includeUnmatchedFromGroup)
Instantiate a new GlobPathRecognizer.

Parameters:
moduleAccessor - manages persistence
format - Format which this class can recognize
fileGroupingExpr - String containing regular expression to group candidate files
mustHaveExpr - String containing regular expression to identify required candidate files
mayHaveExpr - String containing regular expression to identify optional candidate files
fileGroupingCaptureGroupIndex - int containing capture group index in fileGroupingExpr that captures the part of the file path which indicates related files
mustHaveCaptureGroupIndex - int containing capture group index in fileGroupingExpr that captures the part of the file path which indicates file is required
mayHaveCaptureGroupIndex - int containing capture group index in fileGroupingExpr that captures the part of the file path which indicates file is optional
minMustHavesToIdentify - int containing minimum number of files that must match the mustHaveExpr in order for a set of Sources to be considered an instance of an aggregate Format. Allows us to identify potentially defective instances
includeUnmatchedFromGroup - boolean which indicates whether or not to include in a Source that is part of the FormatIdentification returned by this class any files which match the grouping expression, but do not match either mustHaveExpr or mayHaveExpr
Method Detail

recognize

public Set<ClumpSource> recognize(JHOVE2 jhove2,
                                  Source source)
                           throws IOException,
                                  JHOVE2Exception
Aggregate identifier of the source unit.

Parameters:
jhove2 - JHOVE2 core framework
source - Source unit
Returns:
Recognized clump source units
Throws:
IOException
JHOVE2Exception
See Also:
Recognizer.recognize(org.jhove2.core.JHOVE2, org.jhove2.core.source.Source)

groupSources

protected Collection<GlobPathMatchInfoGroup> groupSources(Source source)
                                                   throws JHOVE2Exception
Constructs candidate instances of an aggregate format by grouping together all children of source parameter that match fileGroupingToken

Parameters:
source - Source object whose child Sources are to be explored for groups constituting instances of a format
Returns:
Collection of GlobPathMatchInfoGroup objects, each of which contains a list of likely related Sources comprising an instance of a Format, and indications as to whether or not each Source in the group is a required or optional or unspecified component of that Format instances
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

recognizeGroupedSource

protected ClumpSource recognizeGroupedSource(GlobPathMatchInfoGroup fileGroup,
                                             JHOVE2 jhove2)
                                      throws JHOVE2Exception
Inspects candidate group to determine if it comprises instance of Format

Parameters:
jhove2 - framework configured with SourceFactory
Returns:
FormatIdentification for this group if it comprises instance of a Format; otherwise returns null;
Throws:
JHOVE2Exception

compilePatterns

protected void compilePatterns()
                        throws JHOVE2Exception
Compiles regular expression patterns used in globbing

Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - Any PatternSyntaxException is thrown as JHOVE2Exception and allowed to bubble up to stop processing, as configuration needs fixing

getMinMustHavesToIdentify

@ReportableProperty(order=2,
                    value="Minimum number of files that must match the mustHaveExp")
public int getMinMustHavesToIdentify()
Get minimum number of files that must match the mustHaveExpr in order for a set of Sources to be considered an instance of an aggregate Format. Allows us to identify potentially defective instances of a format

Returns:
minMustHavesToIdentify

setMinMustHavesToIdentify

public void setMinMustHavesToIdentify(int minMustHavesToIdentify)
Sets minimum number of files that must match the mustHaveExpr in order for a set of Sources to be considered an instance of an aggregate Format. Allows us to identify potentially defective instances of a format

Parameters:
